mapper.insert: insert into request_info(cust_no, req_title, req_file, req_cate, req_content, req_price) values (#{cust_no}, #{req_title}, #{req_file}, #{req_cate}, #{req_content}, #{req_price})
mapper.select: SELECT ri.* FROM request_info ri JOIN like_info li ON ri.cust_no = li.cust_no LEFT JOIN proposal_info pi ON ri.req_no = pi.req_no JOIN customer_info ci ON ri.cust_no = ci.cust_no JOIN seller_info si ON li.seller_no = si.seller_no WHERE ri.is_canceled = 'N' AND ri.is_completed = 'N' AND li.seller_no = #{seller_no} AND (pi.is_chosen = 'N' OR pi.is_chosen IS NULL) ORDER BY CASE WHEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(si.seller_addr, ' ', 1) = SUBSTRING_INDEX(ci.cust_addr, ' ', 1) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, YEAR(ri.created_at) DESC, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM request_info ri_sub WHERE ri_sub.cust_no = ri.cust_no AND ri_sub.is_completed = 'Y') DESC, ri.created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
